channel.title: Arts on Jackie Loven
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on Jackie Loven

item.title: Acrylic on canvas
item.description: See more of my recent art (and better photos!) on my painting Instagram @jackie.loven Enjoy! Wineglasses and fruit, 2020 Through my window, 2020, 48"x48” Cheetos Puffs, 2020, 8"x10” Wineglasses, 2020, for sale Signed album covers (Bahamas, Electric Guest, Magic City Hippies, The Palms, Bay Ledges), 2018-2020 Sleeping cat card, 2019 Bep, 2020. http://bep.world Abstract shapes, 2020

item.title: Glassblowing
item.description: Pitcher and vases, 2019 Me finishing up a pitcher, 2018 Organic shapes and small vase, 2020 Pitcher made from scraps of glass found around the studio, 2019 Tiny pitcher, 2019

item.title: Torchwork
item.description: See more of my recent figurines (and better photos!) on my glass Instagram @jackies.glass Enjoy! “Rio”, a commission of a family dog ornament for a friend, 2019 “See no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil” monkeys, 2019 Turtle with lens back, 2019 Small friends, including Bep, 2020.

item.title: Calligraphy
item.description: Matt and Jen’s BnB, a commission for a friend, 2018 Envelope for a card, 2019 Valentine’s Day cards, 2015 Personal card for a new father, 2019. Cocktail menu, 2019. Thank you poster, 2017.

item.title: Watercolors
item.description: San Francisco, 2015 Brooklyn, 2014 Painted Ladies, a commission for a friend, 2015 Beside the Point, a commission for a friend, 2015. How we do late night Louie’s, 2015.
